dict.acceptation: 接近；着手处理；使移近；试图贿赂（或影响，疏通）；

sent.orig: An achieving approach can be adopted alongside either a deep approach or a surface approach.
sent.trans: 无论是深入学习还是表层学习的方法，都应该带有一般学习方法。

sent.orig: Three basic appraisal methods acknowledged by the international are cost approach, income approach and market approach.
sent.trans: 国际公认的资产评估三大基本方法是市场法、收益法、成本法，我国评估实践中较少使用市场法，这其中虽然有各种原因，然而市场法还是具有广阔的应用前景。

sent.orig: We mainly use production approach and income approach, also develop expenditure accounting approach.
sent.trans: 以生产法和收入法为主，也开展支出法核算。

sent.orig: Three traditional approaches to studying leadership the trait approach, the behavioral approach, and the situational approach.
sent.trans: 研究领导的三种传统理论是：特性理论、行为理论和情景理论。

sent.orig: ESL teaching, both the process approach and length approach have advantages over the traditional product approach.
sent.trans: 相较传统的成果教学法，过程法和写长法这两种新的写作教学方法都具有一定的优点。
